WebLink.description: Override New button to default Name field with the standard Name
WebLink.url: {!IF( ISBLANK(SPEN_Job__c.Id), URLFOR('/lightning/o/SPEN_Planning__c/new?count=1&nooverride=1&useRecordTypeCheck=1&defaultFieldValues=Name=Number to be generated by system'), URLFOR('/lightning/o/SPEN_Planning__c/new?count=1&nooverride=1&navigationLocation=RELATED_LIST&useRecordTypeCheck=1&defaultFieldValues=Name=Number to be generated by system,SPEN_Job__c='+SPEN_Job__c.Id))}
